title: Malewatch Watch Face
summary: Watchface design by Kazimir MalevichEach second you get new cubist masterpiece
description: Exquisite Watch face design for Android smartwatch.FREE Watch FaceSupported Watch Resolutions up to - 480pxThis app is fully compatible with the following watches :- LG Watch Urbane 2- Huawei Watch- Moto 360 2nd Gen- Samsung Galaxy Gear Live- LG G Watch- Motorola Moto 360- LG R watch- Asus Zen-watch- Sony smartwatch 3- Any other Android Wear WatchAfter install on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch.
descriptionHTML:
Exquisite Watch face design for Android smartwatch.

FREE Watch Face

Supported Watch Resolutions up to - 480px

This app is fully compatible with the following watches :
- LG Watch Urbane 2
- Huawei Watch
- Moto 360 2nd Gen
- Samsung Galaxy Gear Live
- LG G Watch
- Motorola Moto 360
- LG R watch
- Asus Zen-watch
- Sony smartwatch 3
- Any other Android Wear Watch

After install on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch.
comments: Very poor quality graphics on my Moto 360 1st gen. Uninstalled.
Nice Pls adv if I need to keep this installed forever in my phone or can be removed once saved in the watch.
please give us the ability to change the color on hands and markers...
very cool looking... but day of week and date would be nice too...maybe a tap function to keep display clean ðŸ˜‰
day and date would make this watch face rated as 5 stars! =)
good I like it so much
